api_list.name: Metamask Login
File upload search
List genres
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://media-group.p.rapidapi.com/genres"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "media-group.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://media-group.p.rapidapi.com/track-search"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "media-group.p.rapidapi.com"
